message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item is valued at $120 by me, reflecting its quality and exclusivity. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to proceed with the purchase?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your proposal. While we aim to accommodate all our customers, I must respectfully decline the offer at $95. Our product is highly valued due to its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $105, which I believe strikes a fair balance between value and affordability. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this is within your consideration.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer a counterproposal of $102 for the product. This price reflects the value of our item while remaining competitive within your budget. I hope this suggestion will be acceptable and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $98 for the product. I hope this is a price you can consider.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm glad we're able to continue discussing the price of our product. After further review, I propose a counteroffer of $100 for the item. This price respects both the value of the product and your budget considerations. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range and allows us to finalize the transaction.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a final price of $97 for the product. I hope this is a price you can consider.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to compromise. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer a counteroffer of $99 for the product. I believe this price respects both the value of the item and your budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to conclude our discussion.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a solution. I would like to propose a final price of $96 for the product. I hope this is a price you can consider within our discussions.
